dropboxbusiness_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to Dropbox Business in ${node}
dropboxbusiness_file_updated: ${user}  updated file ${path} in Dropbox Business in ${node}
dropboxbusiness_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in Dropbox Business in ${node}
dropboxbusiness_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the Dropbox Business addon for ${node}
dropboxbusiness_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the Dropbox Business addon for ${node}
